channel.title: Serverstat page posting Error (more info inside)
channel.description:
Well every time i post my server it says:
Sorry, you can only post one server at a time. --------------------------------------------
Wich is a bug of the serverstatpage (please fix it!) because:
It worked before, server is off for like 2 months, so its way belong 40% now. Its not the name (i tested with lhdflhafh) Its not wrong ip, because if i test it with runelocus the server is ONLINE.
So my conclusion is, its a website error. ----------------------------------------- Somthing i want to know, is there another site where i can post my server, wich is pretty much used?
Thanks all for helping!
ohh and btw, if someone knows how to fix, or gives a good site, i glady give you admin on my server!
cheers, Eijsvogel

item.description:
@eijsvogel wrote:

Well every time i post my server it says:

Sorry, you can only post one server at a time.

Wich is a bug of the serverstatpage (please fix it!)
because:

It worked before, server is off for like 2 months, so its way belong 40% now.
Its not the name (i tested with lhdflhafh)
Its not wrong ip, because if i test it with runelocus the server is ONLINE.

So my conclusion is, its a website error.

Somthing i want to know, is there another site where i can post my server, wich is pretty much used?

Thanks all for helping!

ohh and btw, if someone knows how to fix, or gives a good site, i glady give you admin on my server!

cheers, Eijsvogel
